marklogic.body:
Look: I'm we didn't end up on opposite sides, and yes, being a Red Eye fan is surely tough for some people. But to focus on the one bad element of a show and ignore the rest? Heck, I'm sure there were some good jokes in that show from one of the panelists, from Greg, or from Andy, but I guess I just totally understand why they would be bothered by their fans' negativity. I thought you were stupid for not understanding, ergo my far too long and boring as hell post. :P
So:
/Obama
Let me be clear:
Obama\
I'm sorry for coming Off like a jerky jerk who's kind of a jerk (I heard that from Greg one day, talking about Obama; does that make him hypocritical? :P), and I gotta admit, I wrote much of that time LATE last night (I stayed up till 1AM) on an iPod touch, what I am using now, and it all sounded better then.
Though I hope you understand my overall point which is all I would ask.
